# Gitcoin: 7 - Port an Existing Ethereum dApp to Polyjuice

https://gitcoin.co/issue/nervosnetwork/grants/8/100026214

## Tutorial : convert an Ethereum application

From : https://github.com/Kuzirashi/blockchain-workshop/tree/ethereum-simple

To : https://github.com/Kuzirashi/blockchain-workshop/tree/godwoken-simple

## Github Repo

https://github.com/Schrubitteflau/Nervos-7-Click-The-Block
